mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply_enterprise_loan (id, apply_time, company, company_no, contact, contact_mobile, deadline, description, guarantee_name, has_guarantee, industry, money, status, type, province, city, paymentfrom, purchase_time, price, loanWay, contactSex) VALUES(#{id}, #{applyTime}, #{company}, #{companyNo}, #{contact}, #{contactMobile}, #{deadline}, #{description}, #{guaranteeName}, #{hasGuarantee}, #{industry}, #{money}, #{status}, #{type}, #{province}, #{city}, #{paymentFrom}, #{purchaseTime}, #{price}, #{loanWay}, #{contactSex})
